reviews.review_msg: TRAGEDY!!! The comments appear pretty split. But keep in mind that if you decide he is a total **** (which I suspect you will), remember that he is also the English Department chair, ENJOY.

Peter is neither shallow nor condescending, and he doesn't play favorites--he simply rewards intelligence and hard work.  These comments about appearance, and barely-veiled homophobic criticisms like "pseudo-feminine," are just the complaints of ignorant slackers who don't want to work.  Grow up and appreciate a great prof.

A great prof and as a result, a great class.  Has a very sarcastic and quick-witted sense of humour which keeps lectures entertaining.  Approachable, well-organized, fair, etc.  Course isn't nearly as advanced as the course number may suggest, it's for non-English majors and stays true to that.  HIGHLY recommend for B-Hum req over other 100-levels.
